column14: 18. NO EVIDENCE OF RODENT OR INSECT OUTER OPENINGS PROTECTED/RODENT PROOFED, A WRITTEN LOG SHALL BE MAINTAINED AVAILABLE TO THE INSPECTORS - Comments: NO PEST CONTROL LOG BOOK ON SITE. PROVIDE SAME.   THE OUTER OPENING FRONT DOOR HAS A ONE INCH GAP AT THE BOTTOM OF THE DOOR AND THE DOOR IN POOR REPAIR DOES NOT STAY CLOSED.  INSTRUCED TO REPAIR OR REPLACE THE DOOR TO MAKE IT TIGHT FITTING AND RODENT PROOFED. SERIOUS CITATION GIVEN 7-38-020. | 34. FLOORS: CONSTRUCTED PER CODE, CLEANED, GOOD REPAIR, COVING INSTALLED, DUST-LESS CLEANING METHODS USED - Comments: FLOOR THRU-OUT PREMISES IN POOR REPAIR, MISSING, CRACKED TILES, UNEVEN SURFACE. INSTD TO REPAIR SAME SO AS TO BE SMOOTH, EVEN EASILY CLEANABLE SURFACE. (INCLUDING WALK-IN COOLER)    | 35. WALLS, CEILINGS, ATTACHED EQUIPMENT CONSTRUCTED PER CODE: GOOD REPAIR, SURFACES CLEAN AND DUST-LESS CLEANING METHODS - Comments: SEAL ALL HOLES IN THE WALLS SO NO INSECT OR RODENT HARBORAGE. | 41. PREMISES MAINTAINED FREE OF LITTER, UNNECESSARY ARTICLES, CLEANING  EQUIPMENT PROPERLY STORED - Comments: SOME CLUTTER IN THE BASEMENT STORE ROOM.   INSTRUCTED TO REMOVE THE CLUTTER AND CLEAN AND ORGNIZE SO NO INSECT OR RODENT HARBORAGE.

30. FOOD IN ORIGINAL CONTAINER, PROPERLY LABELED: CUSTOMER ADVISORY POSTED AS NEEDED - Comments: MUST LABEL AND DATE ALL PREPARED AND COOKED FOOD ITEMS INSIDE PREP COOLERS. | 32. FOOD AND NON-FOOD CONTACT SURFACES PROPERLY DESIGNED, CONSTRUCTED AND MAINTAINED - Comments: RUSTY FOOD STORAGE SHELVING INSIDE REAR FOOD STORAGE ROOM. MUST REPAINT OR REPLACE.    FROZEN MEATS STORED IN PLASTIC GROCERY BAGS INSIDE REAR FREEZER. INSTRUTED TO USE FOOD GRADE STORAGE BAGS. | 33. FOOD AND NON-FOOD CONTACT EQUIPMENT UTENSILS CLEAN, FREE OF ABRASIVE DETERGENTS - Comments: DETAIL CLEAN VENTILATION HOOD AND FILTERS AQBOVE COOKING EQUIPMENT. MUST REMOVE ACCUMULATION OF GREASE.  DETAIL CLEAN INTERIOR AND EXTERIOR OF ICE MACHINE AND EXTERIOR OF COOKING EQUIPMENT. | 34. FLOORS: CONSTRUCTED PER CODE, CLEANED, GOOD REPAIR, COVING INSTALLED, DUST-LESS CLEANING METHODS USED - Comments: OBSERVED FLOOR IN KITCHEN FOOD PREP AREA IN FRONT OF 3-COMPARTMENT SINK BROKEN. MUST REPAIR/REPLACE. | 37. TOILET ROOM DOORS SELF CLOSING: DRESSING ROOMS WITH LOCKERS PROVIDED: COMPLETE SEPARATION FROM LIVING/SLEEPING QUARTERS - Comments: EMPLOYEE WASHROOM DOOR NOT SELF-CLOSING. MUST PROVIDE A SELF-CLOSING DEVICE. | 38. VENTILATION: ROOMS AND EQUIPMENT VENTED AS REQUIRED: PLUMBING: INSTALLED AND MAINTAINED - Comments: ADDITIONAL WATER PRESSSURE IS NEEDED AT FRONT BAR  3-COMPARTMENT SINK. MUST REPAIR/MAINTAIN. | 40. REFRIGERATION AND METAL STEM THERMOMETERS PROVIDED AND CONSPICUOUS - Comments: MUST PROVIDE A VISIBLE WORKING THERMOMETER AT ALL REFRIGERATION UNITS IN FOOD PREPARATION AREA. | 41. PREMISES MAINTAINED FREE OF LITTER, UNNECESSARY ARTICLES, CLEANING  EQUIPMENT PROPERLY STORED - Comments: MUST REMOVE UNNECESSARY ARTICLES FROM FRONT SELLING AREA TO PREVENT RODENT HARBORAGE. | 43. FOOD (ICE) DISPENSING UTENSILS, WASH CLOTHS PROPERLY STORED - Comments: WIPING CLOTHES STORED ON TOP OF PREP TABLES. MUST PROPERLY STOREIPING CLOTHES IN A SANITIZING SOLUTION WHEN NOT IN USE.

30. FOOD IN ORIGINAL CONTAINER, PROPERLY LABELED: CUSTOMER ADVISORY POSTED AS NEEDED - Comments: FOUND BULK FOOD ITEMS NOT LABELED.(FLOUR, SUGAR,ETC.) | 34. FLOORS: CONSTRUCTED PER CODE, CLEANED, GOOD REPAIR, COVING INSTALLED, DUST-LESS CLEANING METHODS USED - Comments: FOUND FLOORS ALONG WALLS NOT CLEAN. | 41. PREMISES MAINTAINED FREE OF LITTER, UNNECESSARY ARTICLES, CLEANING  EQUIPMENT PROPERLY STORED - Comments: FOUND CLUTTER AT REAR OF PREMISES THAT NEEDS TO BE REMOVED.(BOXES,ETC.)

3. POTENTIALLY HAZARDOUS FOOD MEETS TEMPERATURE REQUIREMENT DURING STORAGE, PREPARATION DISPLAY AND SERVICE - Comments: NOTED POTENTIALLY HAZARDOUS FOODS AT IMPROPER TEMPERATURES.  NOTED APPROXIMATELY 20LBS OF BEEF AT IMPROPER TEMPERATURES RANGING BETWEEN 46.7-50.1 DEGREES F.  MUST MAINTAIN POTENTIALLY HAZARDOUS FOODS AT 40 DEGREES F AND BELOW OR 140 DEGREES F AND ABOVE.  CRITICAL CITATION ISSUED 7-38-005A | 18. NO EVIDENCE OF RODENT OR INSECT OUTER OPENINGS PROTECTED/RODENT PROOFED, A WRITTEN LOG SHALL BE MAINTAINED AVAILABLE TO THE INSPECTORS - Comments: NOTED EVIDENCE OF RODENTS ON SITE.  NOTED APPROXIMATLEY 10 RAT DROPPINGS IN CORNERS IN BASEMENT FOOD STORAGE AREA.  ALSO NOTED OPENING ALONG WALL.  MUST REMOVE DROPPINGS,SANITIZE AFFECTED AREAS AND HAVE THE PEST CONTROL COMPANY SERVICE AREAS.  MUST ALSO SEAL ANY OPENINGS.  SERIOUS CITATION ISSUED 7-38-020 | 31. CLEAN MULTI-USE UTENSILS AND SINGLE SERVICE ARTICLES PROPERLY STORED: NO REUSE OF SINGLE SERVICE ARTICLES - Comments: MUST CLEAN AND SANITIZE SOILED MULTI USE ITEMS. ALSO PROPERLY STORE UTENSILS.  (DO NOT STORE KNIVES BETWEEN EQUIPMENT) | 33. FOOD AND NON-FOOD CONTACT EQUIPMENT UTENSILS CLEAN, FREE OF ABRASIVE DETERGENTS - Comments: MUST DETAIL CLEAN INTERIOR OF COOLERS,FREEZERS AND FRYERS.  ALSO CLEAN THE HOOD ABOVE THE COOKING EQUIPMENT AND ALL PREP TABLES. | 34. FLOORS: CONSTRUCTED PER CODE, CLEANED, GOOD REPAIR, COVING INSTALLED, DUST-LESS CLEANING METHODS USED - Comments: MUST DETAIL CLEAN FLOORS IN BASEMENT STORAGE AREA AND THROUGHOUT PREP AND DISH WASHING AREAS. MUST REMOVE GREASE AND OTHER FOOD DEBRIS.  | 36. LIGHTING: REQUIRED MINIMUM FOOT-CANDLES OF LIGHT PROVIDED, FIXTURES SHIELDED - Comments: MUST PROVIDE LIGHT SHIELDS ABOVE FRONT PREP AREA AND REAR PREP AREA. | 38. VENTILATION: ROOMS AND EQUIPMENT VENTED AS REQUIRED: PLUMBING: INSTALLED AND MAINTAINED - Comments: MUST REPAIR THE LEAKY FAUCET AT THE THREE COMPARTMENT SINK.  PROVIDE SPLASH GUARD BETWEEN 3 COMPARTMENT SINK AND DOUGH ROLLER. | 41. PREMISES MAINTAINED FREE OF LITTER, UNNECESSARY ARTICLES, CLEANING  EQUIPMENT PROPERLY STORED - Comments: MUST REMOVE ALL CLUTTER FROM BASEMENT. MUST ORGANIZE ITEMS AND STORE 6 INCHES OFF THE FLOOR.  | 42. APPROPRIATE METHOD OF HANDLING OF FOOD (ICE) HAIR RESTRAINTS AND CLEAN APPAREL WORN - Comments: MUST PROVIDE HAIR RESTRAINTS FOR ALL FOOD HANDLERS.

31. CLEAN MULTI-USE UTENSILS AND SINGLE SERVICE ARTICLES PROPERLY STORED: NO REUSE OF SINGLE SERVICE ARTICLES - Comments: SINGLE SERVICE UTENSILS ARE IMPROPERLY STORED. INSTD TO STORE PROPERLY HANDLE UP. | 32. FOOD AND NON-FOOD CONTACT SURFACES PROPERLY DESIGNED, CONSTRUCTED AND MAINTAINED - Comments: INTERIOR PANEL OF ICE MACHINE NOT MAINTAINED, CALCIUM BUILD-UP. INSTD TO CLEAN AND MAINTAIN SAME

29. PREVIOUS MINOR VIOLATION(S) CORRECTED 7-42-090 - Comments: PREVIOUS MINOR VIOLATIONS NOT CORRECTED PER MUNICIPAL CODE OF CHICAGO FROM REPORT #1277828 ON 5-10 14. 35-EXTENSIVE PEELING PAINT AROUND EXHAUST DUCT IN KITCHEN ABOVE EQUIPMENT. INSTRUCTED TO REMOVE PEELING PAINT AND REPAINT SURFACE. 38-SECOND SERVING/PREP AREA NOT PROVIDED WITH HAND SINK. INSTRUCTED TO INSTALL HANDSINK WITH HOT AND COLD RUNNING WATER AND MUST BE ACCESSIBLE TO FOOD HANDLER. SERIOUS VIOLATION 7-42-090 CITATION ISSUED. | 32. FOOD AND NON-FOOD CONTACT SURFACES PROPERLY DESIGNED, CONSTRUCTED AND MAINTAINED - Comments: REMOVE RUST DEPOSITS ON SHELVES INSIDE MILK COOLERS. | 34. FLOORS: CONSTRUCTED PER CODE, CLEANED, GOOD REPAIR, COVING INSTALLED, DUST-LESS CLEANING METHODS USED - Comments: SEAL OPENING IN FLOOR ALONG BASEBOARDS IN HALLWAY NEAR WASHROOMS IN TEACHERS LOUNGE. | 35. WALLS, CEILINGS, ATTACHED EQUIPMENT CONSTRUCTED PER CODE: GOOD REPAIR, SURFACES CLEAN AND DUST-LESS CLEANING METHODS - Comments: REMOVE PEELING PAINT ON DUCT EQUIPMENT IN KITCHEN AND WALLS NEAR WALK-IN FREEZER. | 36. LIGHTING: REQUIRED MINIMUM FOOT-CANDLES OF LIGHT PROVIDED, FIXTURES SHIELDED - Comments: REPLACE MISSING LIGHT SHIELDS IN WALK-IN COOLER, WALK-IN FREEZER, AND VENTILATION HOOD. | 37. TOILET ROOM DOORS SELF CLOSING: DRESSING ROOMS WITH LOCKERS PROVIDED: COMPLETE SEPARATION FROM LIVING/SLEEPING QUARTERS - Comments: REPAIR SELF-CLOSING DEVICE ON LUNCHROOM STAFF WASHROOM DOOR. | 38. VENTILATION: ROOMS AND EQUIPMENT VENTED AS REQUIRED: PLUMBING: INSTALLED AND MAINTAINED - Comments: REPAIR HOT WATER AT RIGHT SINK IN BOYS FIRST FLOOR WASHROOM. ADJUST MIXING VALVE ON SINK IN KINDERGARTEN WASHROOM. | 41. PREMISES MAINTAINED FREE OF LITTER, UNNECESSARY ARTICLES, CLEANING  EQUIPMENT PROPERLY STORED - Comments: ORGANIZE ALL STORAGE AREAS IN BOOK ROOM, PRE-K AND KINDERGARTEN CLASSROOMS. ELEVATE ALL STOCK OFF FLOOR IN STORAGE AREAS.
